mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Ellis House was built by the current owners of Crab Tree Farm in 1993, based on plans published in the December 1903 issue of The Craftsman magazine—one of those drawn up by the architect Harvey Ellis during his brief tenure with Stickley. All of the interiors are based on suggestions in Stickley’s magazine. The details and finishes were taken from renderings, drawings, and detailed descriptions offered in the magazine. -- https://artsandcraftshomes.com/interiors/mind-gustav-stickley [work]
